name: Battle Grounds
description: This is my first ever game. It's a bit like ravenfield at the moment, but I will add more features in later updates... SandBox mode will be a bit more like ancient warfare 3. Currently, the game is pretty blank. The only mode that I can say for sure works is Single Player Bot Battle, the other modes are either empty or extremely under polished. Despite all that though, I have learned a lot, and will hopefully continue developing. Any donations or suggestions are greatly appreciated!
